storyInfo: After the Siesta incident, Schwarz decides to accompany Ceylon as she leaves home for Rhodes Island. Before she goes, Mayor Herman gives her a task.

attributes.content: Attention, citizens and guests, do not be alarmed. The earthquake that occurred during the prior day's concert was an abnormal occurrence.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: A thorough analysis by Catastrophe Messenger Mr. Cronin has determined that such a thing will not happen again.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Therefore, after careful consideration and consultation with the performers, the city has decided to reconvene the concert three days from today.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: At the same time, the city government will continue to closely monitor the situation surrounding the volcano. Please enjoy your visit.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Whew, that was scary the other night.
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: Was it really that bad? I was sleeping in the hotel and I just thought there was some fat guy playing jump rope upstairs.
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: ...I really don't know whether I should call that good luck or bad.
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: But after something that big, I feel like there's still a lot of people out on the street. I'd think the whole town would've gone cold.
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: A lot of folks did leave, but the city government cleaned things up pretty quickly, so not too many.
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: After they stopped the concert, Mayor Herman came out to explain everything himself, and nothing else happened over the last couple days, so everyone's relaxed a lot.
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: I'm glad. Siesta's so awesome, I want to stay at least a few more days.
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: You wanted to see me, Chief?
attributes.name: Bodyguard A

attributes.content: I'm not the chief anymore, Charlie. Since the other day, you're Chief of the Public Security Bureau.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Huh? You finally found a sense of humor, Chief?
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: I'm not joking.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You're dropping something that big on me right here?
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: I've got a seat at the bureau, but there's nothing there for me. The Master will have someone send for me.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: It's enough to tell you.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Chief, don't. You've been away for a month at a time before. Why do you have to up and quit?
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: It's different this time. I have to take Lady Ceylon far, far away, and I will not return for a long time. I've already sent your referral to the Master.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: But to make me the chief...? I'm not up to that challenge.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Of all the people in the bureau, half are useless morons, and the other half don't know how to adapt. You're the only one I can trust.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: But I'm not nearly as tough as you, Chief.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: I've taught you enough to handle your typical gang of mercenaries.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: And for the stuff you can't handle... Over all those years with the Master, the only one that comes to mind is that one elderly gentleman.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, that old guy was crazy tough.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: But he's an exception. You don't have to worry much. If anything happens, you come to me.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Well, it's not like I can say no anyway. I'll do what I can.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: You'll do more than that. If the Master comes to harm, I will come for you.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Chief, seriously, you really need to learn how to talk to people.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: I'm not interested in talking to people. We don't have to talk in this business, and you talk too much.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Goodbye.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Huh? That's it?
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: That's it. The Master is still doing that interview in the TV tower. I've packed my bags, and I'm going to meet up with him shortly.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Oh, then I'll go with you, Chief.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Well, you're about to head off, aren't you? Before you go, I'd like to learn another thing or two for you.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: And since I'm your successor and all, I should probably go visit with Master Herman for a bit.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Hey, wait up, Chief!
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Mayor Herman, is it true that your personal secretary, our dear Mr. Cronin, was seriously injured while surveying the volcano the day before yesterday?
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Yes. It's tragic, but he'll be in hospital for quite some time, I'm afraid.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Oh. We're all very moved by the great sacrifice Mr. Cronin has made to protect Siesta.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Indeed. I am most grateful for his dedication to Siesta over the years, and I ask all concerned citizens not to worry. We are treating him with the very best, state-of-the-art technology.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: We're sure Mr. Cronin will come back to us.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Now then, it's time for a commercial break. Up next, we'll have some questions for Mayor Herman about the new city under construction.
attributes.name: Broadcast

attributes.content: Who's Cronin?
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: He's that one Catastrophe Messenger who was always on TV.
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: Oh yeah. That good-looking guy who comes off kinda pretentious.
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: That's the one. I never thought that much of him, but who would've expected him to give that much for Siesta. I had him all wrong.
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: I mean, I know we locked Cronin up, but it feels kinda bad how we keep talking him up to the public.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: We don't want the people to panic.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Right, but you don't like it either, do you, Chief? I don't know exactly how it went down, but I heard he did you and the Lady dirty.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: You should know better than to believe rumors.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Sure, let's talk about something else. Where exactly are you going?
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: I'm taking Lady Ceylon to work for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Oh, those real, live heroes. I heard the Lady was getting along well with them. Turns out she's already signed up.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Alright, I get it. The Lady's heading out to work, of course you have to go with her.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: It's a pharmaceutical company, and I guess also secretly a mercenary outfit? I guess they'll have something for you to do.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Can't believe it, I turn my head and the Lady's already out getting a job.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Don't talk like you know her.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Hey, I've been in Siesta for five years. I was with the team that took the Lady to school in Victoria.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: But I really don't think she's changed all that much in the years since.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: True enough.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: And neither have you, Chief.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Really. For as long as we've been working for you, all of us feel like you're pretty much the same as you ever were.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: In what way?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Well... hmm, how should I put it?
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: The way you're so focused on the Master and Lady Ceylon, without any regard for yourself.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Our line of work is obviously all about the paymaster, yeah, but you're clearly not in this for the money. You've got a lot more heart in this game than any of us.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: I go to the seaside and sit on the beach, I wander around the music festivals, is that not enough self care?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: It's your life, at the end of the day. Live it how you want. It's just, I've been watching you all these years and I can't believe someone could actually live like that.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Live like what?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Promise me you won't kick my ass first.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: As if I'm so petty.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: We get paid, and the Master's good enough to us. I wouldn't call it love from the bottom of his heart, but the affection's been there these past few years.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: When me and the wife got married, the Master even showed up to say a few words. That made us big shots in the neighborhood, and the misses reminds me every day to work hard for the Master.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: And me, I appreciate him too. So if you're gonna dump this on me, I'll grit my teeth and bear it.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: But I can't say I'll give everything to the Master, Chief.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: If maybe someday somebody threatened my family, I can't promise I'd side with him.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: I'm not asking that much of you.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I know, it's just an example. But honestly, Chief, that's only something you could ever do, because you don't have anyone else. All you've got to worry about in the world is Lady Ceylon and the Master.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: ...They're my family.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: No, they're not. You're not getting it.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: What I mean is, setting aside the Master altogether, if it's my life and my wife's life on the line, I'd hesitate.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: But you wouldn't.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: I wouldn't?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You wouldn't.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: I'm afraid I wouldn't.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Right. As far as you're concerned, the only thing that matters is taking care of the Master and the Lady, it's the only thought in your mind.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: What goes on in my mind is none of your business.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Sure enough it isn't, and I'm in no position to say if that's right or wrong. I'm just talking here. You can tell me if my guess hit the mark or not.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Mr. Mayor, you have Mr. House's banquet next...
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Bump it. Did you forget Ms. Eva's invitation? Prioritize.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Ah, o-of course.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Schwarz, welcome.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Master.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Master.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Charlie, Schwarz has told me what good work you do.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: By the way, please push my schedule thirty minutes.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: What for, may I ask?
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: I have to speak to the Chief Emeritus of my Public Security Bureau.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Th-This is... oh, I-I see.
attributes.name: Secretary

attributes.content: Schwarz, come.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Charlie, since you're here, let's have you go work out some of the formalities with my secretary. He's good with these sorts of things.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Charlie.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: What is it, Chief?
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Siesta's in your hands now.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: ...Right.
attributes.name: Charlie

attributes.content: Cronin had his rebellious streak, but he came in handy. This replacement is worse by a country mile.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Good help is hard to find, Schwarz.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: With some training, he'll prove useful.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: How old were you when you came to kill me? Do you still remember?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Twelve-years-old, Master.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Yes, right, twelve.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: A twelve-year-old assassin. Hah! If you didn't give up on your own, I'm afraid you really might've gotten me.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: As I've told you, the child assassin is not an uncommon tool.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: It's very effective at lowering the target's guard.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I know all that. Thanks to you, I can spot a killer at a glance.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Take that fellow over there in the swimsuit. The way he's looking every which way, wearing those sunglasses, he's a killer.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: He's untrained. And I think he's just scouting the women.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I would say so.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Looks like my kill-dar could use some calibration.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You have me for that.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: But aren't you leaving?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: ...Do you not want me to?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Quite the opposite.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Schwarz, there's a question that's been troubling me for years now.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Your future.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I don't think you need to worry about me at all.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: That's exactly why I'm worried.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I often think of you as an extension of myself, like a third arm. There when I need, and no trouble at all when I don't.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Charlie said something similar not too long ago.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: It's my choice, Master. And I think there's nothing wrong with it.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You gave me this life, and even if you sent me away, I wouldn't leave.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: *Sigh*, what a stubborn girl you are.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I watched you grow. The others may not understand you, but I know you truly do believe there's nothing wrong with that life.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I always thought of you as another daughter, Schwarz.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: When I talk to the movers and shakers of society, they always complain that even after all hope for their children, they're always disappointed when they don't follow the paths they've designed for them.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: And at times like this, I always think to myself: 'I'm so lucky. I have a daughter who, despite our strained relationship, is in all ways the spitting image of a wealthy young girl they speak of, and a daughter who I need not worry about in the slightest.'
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I have no such worries.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: And so you could comfortably turn your energies to the development of Siesta.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Indeed. That's how I once thought.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: But I've grown tired, Schwarz.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: The new city is nearly complete, and the people will be able to move in as soon as the formalities are settled.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I told that Rhodes Island Doctor that Siesta would not perish from the face of this world.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: But what I didn't tell the Doctor is that the Siesta in my heart is already long gone.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: The Siesta I promised to Barbara, the Siesta I built for her... I'm abandoning it, in the end.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: There's... nothing you could have done.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: No, that one would have had a way. That's a person who always has a way.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: After Barbara passed, I made the construction of this city my one goal. I did everything to achieve it.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: And now, for such a simple reason, I give it up.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I can't accept it, Schwarz.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Master...
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You know, there's been a thought plaguing my mind.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: The idea that if I can't do anything for this city, if I can only abandon it to its fate, then I should go down with it. That I wouldn't be able to live on anyway.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: So when the migration to the new city is complete, I will bring a chair out here, by myself, and sit on this beach, where I made my promise to Barbara. I'll face this sea, where I buried her.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: And that will be my end.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: No, Master. I won't let you.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Haha, rest assured, if I'm telling you about it, it means I'm not actually going to do it.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You can't... for the Lady's sake.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: That's where you're wrong.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: If there's another reason I can't die, it's you, Schwarz.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: The Lady doesn't hate you so much.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: It doesn't matter. All is well at this point.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: What's more, I don't worry much about the future of my girl Ceylon. I got lucky with that daughter. She'll have a good enough life. I give her what she wants, and that's enough.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: But you, I worry about you.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Parents always want the best for their children.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Only the most rotten old man would keep his children chained to his side, keeping them forever under his control.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: But me, I'd rather die while you're off living your own life with no time to visit me at all.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: My own life...
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: And your life can't be Ceylon's life.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: That's not the way of the world, Schwarz.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: One can have a goal to strive for, but that goal can't be another person. I, as a father, don't want my daughter to suffer through that.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Do you know why I had you go with Ceylon to that Rhodes Island company?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Not to protect her?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: That was one reason, yes. But you've seen how capable they are.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I spoke with their leader, and they won't have Ceylon doing anything that dangerous. More than sending you to look after her, I'm counting you to keep an eye on them, to make sure they don't do her wrong.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: The reason I'm sending you, and more importantly, the reason I'm exercising my authority as a parent...
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I don't understand.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I am laying a path for you that you will not like.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: That is why I am sending you to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: They may welcome my daughter into their fold, but you are different, Schwarz.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Do you know why?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Because I am accompanying the Lady?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Correct. No matter the company in question, they will always want someone willing to follow orders. But you? You have never served them.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You will, of course, serve Ceylon first and foremost, obeying them only secondarily.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: This will be a source of some conflict.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: And knowing you, you'd rather resist them and continue to follow Ceylon.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: But that is not an option. I need you to solve this conflict.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You are not a bodyguard accompanying Ceylon on her work.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I've fired you.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You are now my daughter, looking for a new job.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I want you to go find your own life's work. Ceylon and myself can be involved, but your life's work can't BE Ceylon or myself.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: As for Ceylon, she's been living in Victoria, and judging from this past incident, she's learned to stand on her own two feet.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: But you haven't, Schwarz.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: On this point, you're quite different from her.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You haven't really ever really left home to do your own thing.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I did... to get revenge...
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: That's your past. I'm talking about your future.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: So this time, you will truly leave home.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Do you understand?
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: But... can I come back?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Master, after I've killed those enemies, can I come back?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Of course you can.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Hahaha! Come here, Schwarz!
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Schwarz slowly approaches Herman, who places his hand on her head and rubs it intensely.
While I could never be so cold-blooded as to refuse my own daughter entry into my home...
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: If you don't take this seriously, I just might kill myself on this beach someday.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: You can't threaten me like that...
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: But this truly is the one worry I still have weighing on my heart.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: I'll do what I can.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: You'll do more than that. If you fail, you won't be allowed back home.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: ...Right.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Alright is right.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Just a moment.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Hello, Schwarz, where are you?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: With the Master.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: If you're not too busy, could you help me move some things?
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I have too much luggage!
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Alright, I'll be there soon.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Right. You go to Ceylon then.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: By the time you leave with Rhodes Island, I'll have gone to the new city. I won't be there to see you off.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: ...Schwarz.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: Master?
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Live well.
attributes.name: Herman

attributes.content: ...Right.
attributes.name: Schwarz
